Mode.Name: Standalone-OUT-HRTIM_INP
Mode.UserName: Standalone OUT and HRTIMER Ext.Event connection

Condition.Diagnostic:
Only active when DAC3 channel out2 is enabled.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output (or is connected externally on IO pin for OPAMP2 only).
The inverting input VINM is connected to dedicated IO pin.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Only active when DAC3 channel out1 is enabled.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output (or is connected externally on IO pin for OPAMP2 only).
The inverting input VINM is connected to dedicated IO pin.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Only active when DAC4 channel out1 is enabled.

The inverting input VINM is connected to dedicated IO pin.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Mode.Name: PGA Not Connected-OUT-HRTIM_INP
Mode.UserName: PGA Not Connected OUT and HRTIMER Ext.Event connection

Condition.Diagnostic:
Only active when DAC3 channel out1 is enabled.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output (or is connected externally on IO pin for OPAMP2 only).
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Only active when DAC3 channel out2 is enabled.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output (or is connected externally on IO pin for OPAMP2 only).
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Only active when DAC4 channel out1 is enabled.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output (or is connected externally on IO pin for OPAMP2 only).
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Only active when DAC4 channel out2 is enabled.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output (or is connected externally on IO pin for OPAMP2 only).
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Only active when DAC3 channel out1 is enabled.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output (or is connected externally on IO pin for OPAMP2 only).
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors and external IO on VINM0 for filtering.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Only active when DAC4 channel out2 is enabled.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output (or is connected externally on IO pin for OPAMP2 only).
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors and external IO on VINM0 for filtering.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Only active when DAC3 channel out1 is enabled.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output (or is connected externally on IO pin for OPAMP2 only).
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors with VINM0 pin for input or bias.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Only active when DAC3 channel out2 is enabled.

The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors with VINM0 pin for input or bias.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Only active when DAC4 channel out2 is enabled.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output (or is connected externally on IO pin for OPAMP2 only).
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors with VINM0 pin for input or bias.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Only active when DAC3 channel out1 is enabled.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output.
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors with VINM0 pin for input or bias and VINM1 pin for filtering.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Only active when DAC3 channel out2 is enabled.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output.
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors with VINM0 pin for input or bias and VINM1 pin for filtering.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Only active when DAC4 channel out1 is enabled.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output.
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors with VINM0 pin for input or bias and VINM1 pin for filtering.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Only active when DAC4 channel out2 is enabled.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output.
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors with VINM0 pin for input or bias and VINM1 pin for filtering.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Only active when DAC3 channel out1 is enabled.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output (or is connected externally on IO pin for OPAMP2 only).
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors with VINM0 pin for input or bias.
The OPAMP output VOUT is internally connected to a dedicated ADC channel.
(ADC channel can be found in the 'Operational amplifier possible connection' table from reference manual).

Only active when DAC3 channel out2 is enabled.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output (or is connected externally on IO pin for OPAMP2 only).
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors with VINM0 pin for input or bias.
The OPAMP output VOUT is internally connected to a dedicated ADC channel.
(ADC channel can be found in the 'Operational amplifier possible connection' table from reference manual).

Only active when DAC4 channel out1 is enabled.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output (or is connected externally on IO pin for OPAMP2 only).
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors with VINM0 pin for input or bias.
The OPAMP output VOUT is internally connected to a dedicated ADC channel.
(ADC channel can be found in the 'Operational amplifier possible connection' table from reference manual).

Only active when DAC4 channel out2 is enabled.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output (or is connected externally on IO pin for OPAMP2 only).
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors with VINM0 pin for input or bias.
The OPAMP output VOUT is internally connected to a dedicated ADC channel.
(ADC channel can be found in the 'Operational amplifier possible connection' table from reference manual).
